name: Déjà Vu: A Nightmare Comes True!!
summary: Déjà Vu is a point-and-click adventure game that draws inspiration from "noir" detective novels that were popular in the 1940s.

name: Décapita
summary:
An ordinary evening interrupted by a discovery that could change the course of humanity.

Do you believe in free will?

A short visual novel with one choice created for the Stop Killing Games JAM 2025.

name: Déjà Drift
summary: Stuck alone on a retro-futuristic racetrack, your only choice is to drift. Earn as many points as possible before time runs out, and then do it again and again... But wait, there is someone else here? And why does their driving seem so familiar?

name: Déjà Vu I & II: The Casebooks of Ace Harding
summary:
Take on two thrilling mysteries in one Game Pak!

Life is never boring when you assume the role of Ace Harding, private detective. In Deja Vu I, you will scramble down the dark alleys of Chicago, searching for a cure for you amnesia and a killer who has framed you for a brutal murder. After solving the first case, you'll uncover a few loose strings that gradually unrabel into Deja Vu II. Trapped in the slimy town of Last Vegas, you find yourself dealing with a notorious mob leader who makes you an offer you can't refuse.

-Two detailed graphic adventure games in one Game Boy Color Game Pak!
-Detailed commands for interacting with anyone or anything!
-Return to the scene of the crime, or any of the other 140 locations!
-Sort out the real evidence from the red herrings and over 80 other items!
-Battery-backed save option for up to three save game files!

name: Déjà Boom
summary: Each time you die, the level restarts with a "ghost you" that repeats the exact actions you took that lifetime. With every death, more of your past selves join the fight until you're battling alongside an army of the best person ever which is you.

name: Déraciné
summary:
"Déraciné is a brand new story adventure created by the renowned Bloodborne developer, FromSoftware, available exclusively on PSVR.

As a spirit summoned by a young girl in a secluded boarding school, the player must prove its existence and build a unique bond with the students through clever interactions. As the mystery of the story unfolds, the spirit must use its ability to manipulate the forces of life and time to change the fate of the pupils."

name: Désiré
summary: Désiré is a poetic point-and-click adventure game in black and white. From a tender age, he is going to meet several characters who will elicit in Désiré intense emotions. The original game soundtrack is also included with the download.

name: Dépanneur Nocturne
summary: A short exploration game about poking around a convenience store and finding a gift with the help of its owner. But sometimes the perfect gift finds you.

name: Déraciné: Collector's Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Game: Déraciné
- Original Soundtrack
- Luxury Package

name: Déjà Vu
summary: Déjà Vu is a sci-fi puzzle platformer. The player solves puzzles through the use of clones created from actions they recorded.

name: Dé_Intricate
summary: Take part in a personnal story about separating two bodies.

name: Déjà-Vu VR
summary: In the city of “Evia” several residents are infected with light. A girl discovers what appears to be the host. It befriends it, feeds it and houses it. Not to the delight of the other residents. They want to drive the landlord away. A persecution begins ...

name: DésoPadéso
summary:
DésoPadéso is a French online party game based on the famous cards game Cards Against Humanity.

In this game, you play rounds where a sentence with empty spots is showed to you and you have to fill them with words and short expressions you have at you disposal to try to make the funniest proposal.

name: Dérive
summary:
A first person exploratory adventure EP.
Wander through a lost land: piece together your own folktales of the history of an ancient realm. What events once transpired and who used to dwell here?
